sentences.en: " I must tarry at home, and keep watch over my little Pearl.
sentences.cn: “ 我得呆在家里, 照顾好我的小珠儿.

sentences.en: And he went in to tarry with them.
sentences.cn: 耶稣就进去,要同他们住下.

sentences.en: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.
sentences.cn: 8但我要仍旧住在以弗所,直等到五旬节.

sentences.en: Do not tarry on the way.
I saw no reason to tarry in that town.
sentences.cn: 我看不出要滞留在那城镇的理由.
我闻到了柏油熔化了的味道。

sentences.en: Mark Twain once went to borrow a certain book from a neighbour in Tarry town.
sentences.cn: 一次马克.吐温向Tarry镇的邻居借一本书.

sentences.en: Tarry awhile at this charming country inn.
sentences.cn: 在这个可爱的乡村小酒馆里呆一会儿吧.

sentences.en: Tarry with me and I will cut your head off.
sentences.cn: 胆敢和我纠结,我就把你的头砍下来.

sentences.en: Then said Joab, I may not tarry thus with thee.
sentences.cn: 14约押说, 我不能与你留连.

sentences.en: Then saith he unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful, even unto death: tarry ye here, and watch with me.
sentences.cn: 便对他们说，我心里甚是忧伤，几乎要死。 你们在这里等候，和我一同儆醒。

sentences.en: Two old boys tarried on the street corner discussing cattle.
sentences.cn: 两个大男孩在街角停留许久，讨论关于牲口的事情。

sentences.en: What is my valley to you, that you shouldst tarry in it?
sentences.cn: 我这山谷跟你有什么相干, 你为什么留在这儿不走 呢 ?

sentences.en: Why did he tarry so long on his way home?
sentences.cn: 他为何在回家的路上逗留这麽久?

sentences.en: Why did he tarry so long on his way to school?
sentences.cn: 他为什么在上学途中耽搁了那么久?

sentences.en: Why do you tarry so long?
Would ye tarry for them till they were grown?
sentences.cn: 你们岂能等着他们长大 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 柏油帆布；防水帽；防水衣；涂焦油防水布

trans.tran_en: covered with  tar (= a thick black liquid )
to delay or be slow in going somewhere
